title: Data Tables Studio
description: Generate structured tables from your chats, documents, and knowledge base using natural language prompts.
betaDescription: Data Tables is currently in beta. Table generation requires backend support.
offline: Server is offline. Please connect to use Data Tables.

wizard.tipText: Select chats, documents, or search your knowledge base to extract structured data. The more specific your sources, the better the results.

ragPlaceholder: Enter a search query for your knowledge base...
ragTip: Enter search queries to find relevant content in your knowledge base. Each query will be added as a separate source.
promptLabel: Describe the table you want to create
promptPlaceholder: E.g., Create a table comparing the main topics discussed, with columns for topic, key points, and relevance score...
columnHintsDesc: Suggest column names and types to guide the LLM. If not specified, columns will be inferred from your prompt.
generatingNote: This may take a moment depending on the amount of data.
previewModified: You've modified the preview. Changes will be saved with the table.
tableNamePlaceholder: Enter a name for your table
tableDescPlaceholder: Add a description to help you remember what this table contains
tableSavedDesc: Your table has been saved to the library. You can view and export it anytime.
goBackToGenerate: Go back to the previous step to generate a table first.
noTables: No tables yet. Create your first table!
noSearchResults: No tables found matching your search
deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this table? This action cannot be undone.
columnNameTooLong: Column name must be 50 characters or less
columnNameExists: A column with this name already exists
columnDescriptionHint: A brief description of what this column contains
columnDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., The price of the item in USD
discardUnsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close?
